1.content:
Damien Doxen - A 5 year old shy and quiet Dalmatian pup. Height: 3ft.


Sam Maneson - A 6 year old adventurous lion cub. Height: 3.3 ft.


Tyrone 'Roni' Collins - A 10 year old black and white Border Collie who dabbles into science. Height: 4.5 ft.


Max Howland - A 2 year old playful gray wolf pup. Height: 2.8 ft.
1.title: Character Selection

13.content: Where does his story takes place?
13.title: Tyrone Collins

131.content:
Choose a scenario:

Surprise Package - Tyrone comes back home from school to discover a package on his porch that come from the mail sent for him even though he didn't order or ask for anything. But what is held inside is a mystery that will also change his body.

Backyard Discovery - While playing in the backyard, he discovers an object of some kind that affects his body.
131.title: At home

1313.content: The Experiment - Being the scientific pup that he is Roni has a science lab in his room with chem lab set and is able to make even remote control devices and mini ray guns out of household items and cardboard! One experiment he comes up with has strange results and side effects.
1313.title: The Experiment?

13131.content:
Scenarios:

The Potion: Tyrone experiments with his chemistry set ends up making a special potion. After testing it on himself, he begins to change. Possibly a Jekyll and Hyde style transformation.

The Magic Remote: Tyrone tinkered with an old remote he found and, somehow, transformed it into a remote that could change basically anything about a person.

The Ray: Roni makes a ray gun using an old toy and some crystals he found in the backyard. Little did he know that it actually worked and had strange effects on the body.

The Accident: Roni messes with science he doesn't understand, causing an explosion. He's unharmed, but changing... and, possibly, what happened spreads beyond him. Did the explosion send energy out beyond his house? Is whatever happens to him contagious? Only time will tell.
13131.title: The Experiment

131311.content:
In the top left corner of a light blue boy's room, there lied on the left side an entertainment system with a large flat screen TV and consoles connected with a library of games and movies. In the back was a closet with a poster of an atom and lied in the corner of the room was small lab area with a small rectangular table with test tubes and beakers filled with liquids of various colors.

Tyrone in his lab coat with his goggles that sat upon his head was experimenting with chemicals as he selected four of them to put into a beaker. After pouring the liquids, he used a glass stirrer to mix them up carefully. The concoction blended until it settled into a stable and solid color.

What color was the potion?
131311.title: The Potion

1313113.content: What color was the potion?
1313113.title: Other

choices: All young boys in the neighborhood start growing and changing into women.
Any boy that Tyrone comes into contact with starts transforming into a woman.
Tyrone ages and changes, and reality itself changes around him to match.
131314.content:
Young Tyrone was hard at work, fiddling with a random assortment of bits and bobs at his lab set. He honestly didn't have any plan in mind, just mixing fluids and plugging random machine parts together from things he found in the trash. Somehow, it always worked out, creating interesting devices for him to show off and play with. And he expected that he was about to do the same today! With that, he continued his work, twisting a single bolt on his random invention.

Outside the house, practically the entire neighborhood could hear and even slightly feel the explosion coming from Tyrone's home.

Roni sat at his bench, fur singed and eyes wide as he sat, the smoldering remains of his attempted invention in his hands. Somehow, despite the noise, he was unharmed. His equipment less so. As he regained his senses, he looked over it sadly, fighting back tears. He'd been careless, and now he'd paid the price.

Of course, he didn't realize that this wasn't just an explosion. There had been energy from the device released at the same time, rippling through him and possibly through others. But what sort of effect would this energy have?
131314.title: The Accident

131315.content:
The Watch - Roni tinkers with a watch that can alter the user's and other's body.

Teleporter Troubles - Roni creates a teleporter that transports a person in the blink of an eye, but as he tests it, malfunctions happen that changes his body.
131315.title: The Watch/Teleporter Troubles?

13132.content: Game Makeover - After getting a video game for cheap, he goes home to play it only to get transported into the game itself as a female character.
13132.title: Game Makeover?

131321.content:
Tyrone ‘Roni’ Collins, a black and white furred border collie with white on his forelimbs, his muzzle and chest, and the tip of his curved tail and left floppy ear, black on everything else and a bit on the pudgy side and a height of 4.5 ft.

The playful pup in his white and red sleeved shirt and brown shorts held a video game box ran through the two story house of baby blue painted walls as he passed the second eldest teen brother, Jesse, who is basically a foot and few inches taller than Roni and different fur pattern with more white than black, wearing a white jersey shirt and red gym shorts, on the red couch watching some sports game in the den.

He was however, stopped by his eldest brother and legal guardian, Cam who was six foot, slightly muscular and has blotches or patches of brown and purple in his fur. He wore a light blue polo shirt and blue jeans and was in the kitchen, preparing a pot of pasta.

“Where’s the fire, champ?”

“Oh, just got this game from a garage sale for three bucks!”

“Three dollars? Sounds like good deal.”

“Yeah, and it’s for the GameBox too! I’m gonna try it out now!”

“Okay. Have fun! Dinner will be ready in an hour, just so you know.”

“Ok!”

Roni continued up the shag carpeted stairs and went left down the hallway to the end to his bedroom with a yellow caution sigh with a bubbling beaker on the door. He opened the door to reveal a room with light blue walls, decorated with some video game and science related posters like atoms, solar systems, etc. To the right, a twin sized bed with purple covers and blanket and light wooden bedposts.

In the back, was a small table with a kid chemistry set and some cardboard gadgets in front of closet mirror. Opposite of the bed was a three-shelf dresser drawer with an entertainment system next to it. On top of the small two-tier shelving, there was a flat screen TV connecting to a DVD/Blu-Ray player on the top level with a library of movies and a gray box game console on the bottom with a library of games.

He turned on the TV and the console, then he took the game out of the box and insert it into the console, starting the game.

What kind/genre of game is it?
131321.title: Game Makeover

1313211.content: What's the name of the game?
1313211.title: Sci-Fi

1313212.content: What's the name of the game?
1313212.title: Fantasy Adventure

13132122.content:
First, the console’s company logo came on the screen before the title of the game booted up. The title screen had three weapons, a sword with a golden hilt, a silver axe, and a staff crossing and overlapping each other in front of a bronze shield. The words’ Dungeon Divers’ flashed across the screen in front of the weaponry display with a Press Start prompt beneath it.

He grabbed the controller and pressed the start, eager to get into the game.

Some game intro static scenes popped on screen telling the story about a legend of a dark overlord spreading chaos throughout the realms and in order to defeat him, a hero or heroes are chosen to find and activate four crystals sealed in dungeons that harnesses a great power.

After that, the screen went over to a few sets of menus for character building, first was choosing between male or female. He chosen male which lead to the next menu and set of choices. This time it was for character jobs/classes. There were the basics such as Warrior, Mage, Fighter, and Thief while others were a bit complex such as Barbarian, Pirate, Ninja, and Druid with their own sets of unique attacks and skills. A lot of good ones to choose from but Roni could only pick just one.

Which job/class did he pick?
13132122.title: Dungeon Divers

131321223.content: Which job/class did he pick?
131321223.title: Fighter/Thief?

1313212232.content:
The thief class had great appeal with its high speed and attack rate with sneak ability. Not to mention the 50% loot bonus was a plus as well.

Roni opted for that class and allocated extra skill points into the stats he thought worked best for his character. After that, it was time to start the game proper.

He pressed the start button, only to get a small window to pop up with a message.

"Warning: You can't go back after choosing your character and settings after you press A and start the game. Are you sure this the character you want to play as?"

Then, the two buttons "Go back" and "Finalize" appeared bellow the window. The pup was sure about his selections and pressed "Finalize".

The screen went black with a loading screen for a minute and then it just went blank with a white screen with nothing happening for a while. This confused Roni, thinking that the game froze or crashed. But then the screen gradually began to glow a bright light that gradually engulfed him and the entire room. He panicked at the moment not knowing what to do until it felt like he was being sucked into the TV and then he blacked out.

When he woke up, he was in...
1313212232.title: Thief

13132122321.content: Exactly where in the desert?
13132122321.title: A desert

131321223213.content: Exactly where in the desert?
131321223213.title: Other

13132122322.content:
When Roni came to, his eyes were met with a clay rocky ceiling with dripping stalactites with the glow of torches attached to the wall. He sat up on the tan furred sleeping bag he was on that was also next to a fire pit that lit most of the room as well.

He also happened to look down to realize that he was buck naked, and instinctively covered up with his hands.

"Where...am I?" he asked nobody in particular as his eyes gazed around the dome like rocky room that seemed to be the size of the gymnasium at school. But there was something else he spotted in the middle of cavern that was very hard to miss.

What was in the center of the cave?
13132122322.title: A cave

131321223221.content:
In the center of the room there lied a red treasure chest with gold trimmings and about a foot less tall in height.

Curious, he went over to the chest, lift open the lid, and looked inside.

What was inside?
131321223221.title: A treasure chest

1313212232211.content: What color is the potion?
1313212232211.title: A potion

13132122322112.content:
Inside the chest was a bubbling blue liquid corked in a test tube like vial. He shook the contents a bit.

He popped off the cork and sniffed the blue stuff, slightly taken aback by scent of berries. Probably safe to drink then.

"Bottoms up." he said as he brought the potion to his muzzle and chug down the bubbly liquid. He let out a satisfied belch as the drink settled in his stomach where a tingling feeling emerged throughout his body.

What happens next?
13132122322112.title: Blue

131321223223.content: What was in the center of the cave?
131321223223.title: Pool of Water/A Giant Tree?

choices: He takes a swim/dip in the water
He drinks some of the water
1313212232231.content:
In the middle of the room was a large circular pool of water that was twenty feet in diameter and length and width, being around four to six feet deep.

He approached the pool, looking down into the water. It looked so pristine, pure and clear, like it hadn't been touched by anyone or anything. It was very tempting to swim in it or even take a drink of water.

What happens next?
1313212232231.title: Pool of water

1313212232233.content: What was in the center of the cave?
1313212232233.title: Monolith/Giant Crystal?

13132122322332.content: What color is the crystal?
13132122322332.title: Giant Crystal

13132122323.content: When he woke up, he was in...
13132122323.title: Forest/Mountain?

131321223231.content: Exactly where in a forest?
131321223231.title: A forest

131321223233.content: When he woke up, he was in...
131321223233.title: Village/Castle?

1313212233.content: Which job/class did he pick?
1313212233.title: Barbarian/Pirate?

13132122332.content:
The pirate class had great appeal with its high speed and attack rate and loot bonus. Also, having the ability to wield cutlasses and blunderbusses gives way to advantages in both melee and long range attacks.

Roni opted for that class and allocated extra skill points into the stats he thought worked best for his character. After that, it was time to start the game proper.

He pressed the start button, only to get a small window to pop up with a message.

"Warning: You can't go back after choosing your character and settings after you press A and start the game. Are you sure this the character you want to play as?"

Then, the two buttons "Go back" and "Finalize" appeared bellow the window. The pup was sure about his selections and pressed "Finalize".

The screen went black with a loading screen for a minute and then it just went blank with a white screen with nothing happening for a while. This confused Roni, thinking that the game froze or crashed. But then the screen gradually began to glow a bright light that gradually engulfed him and the entire room. He panicked at the moment not knowing what to do until it felt like he was being sucked into the TV and then he blacked out.

When he woke up, he was...
13132122332.title: Pirate

13132122333.content: Which job/class did he pick?
13132122333.title: Ninja/Druid?

131321223333.content: Which job/class did he pick?
131321223333.title: Archer/Summoner?

13132123.content: What's the name of the game?
13132123.title: Jurassic Journeys?

131321232.content: What's the name of the game?
131321232.title: Rune Raiders?

1313213.content: What kind/genre of game is it?
1313213.title: Western?

13132131.content: What's the name of the game?
13132131.title: Western

131321313.content: What's the name of the game?
131321313.title: First Person Sixshooter?

131322.content: Halloween Hi-jinx - A series of Halloween based stories that Roni gets transformed.
131322.title: Halloween Hi-jinx?

1313221.content:
Costume Conundrum - Tyrone wants a new costume for Halloween and gets one from the Costume Corral only to experience the costume's effects soon after wearing it.

Candy Coated Chaos - While Trick or Treating with friends, Roni is given a strange new kind of candy with interesting results when eaten.
1313221.title: Halloween Hi-jinx

13132211.content:
“Here we are champ.” Cam Collins said as he parked the olive-green SUV in front of an orange building in a shopping plaza, with a yellow sign that said “The Costume Corral” in green text. He was a 6ft adult twenty-something border collie with black and white fur with some purple blotches esp. over his left eye, wearing a light blue polo shirt and blue jeans.

Next to him in the passenger seat was his littlest brother, Tyrone ‘Roni’ Collins, a black and white furred border collie with white on his forelimbs, his muzzle and chest, and the tip of his curved tail and left floppy ear, black on everything else and a bit on the pudgy side and a height of 4.5 ft, wearing a white and blue striped shirt with brown shorts.

His tail wagged in anticipation as he was getting his new costume since he outgrew his last one. They exited the car and went through the sliding doors inside.

A female gray wolf with lengthy white hair dressed up in a purple witch’s outfit manned the register on the left side near the entrance. The walls fit the Halloween theme of blacks and oranges with wool spider webs and string lights hung around. There were creepy displays of various elaborate eerie décor of pumpkins, ghosts, and everything inflatable. But what was surprising how many costumes this store had, filling the shelves, pegs on the walls, racks and tables. These costumes ran the gamut from the scary and spooky to the fun and playful.

Tyrone looked around the place in bright eyed awe. So many to choose from!

“So what do you like to get Roni?” his older brother asked.

“Hmm…” the pup was in deep thought on what would he like to be for Halloween.

What kind of costume did he choose?
13132211.title: Costume Conundrum

13132211223331.content: What kind of cowboy costume?
13132211223331.title: Cowboy

131322112233331.content:
Thinking of going for something a bit silly and fun than something scary this Halloween, he decided to go with being a baby.

Over at a rack of costumes in the center of the store, he discovered that there were two types of baby costumes. One had a slip on diaper with a light blue shirt that says "Big Baby" with a baby bottle full of supposedly milk and a rattle. The other was a full blue onesie with teddy bear face prints with a teddy bear and pacifier accessory. Both were interesting but he knew he could take only one.

Which costume did he choose?
131322112233331.title: Baby

choices: He tries it on once he got home
1313221122333311.content:
He opted for the diaper since it looked much easier to put on. So he got what he wanted and showed it to his big brother who teased him about being the baby of the family, which made Roni blush in embarrassment. Cam paid for the costume and went on their way.

What happens next?
1313221122333311.title: The Diaper

13132211223333111.content:
Once the brothers got home, Roni couldn't wait to try out the costume as he rushed through the front door pass the kitchen and den, passing his second older brother on the couch watching TV. He ran up the stairs and went down the hallway to the room at the end with a bio-hazard sign on the door.

He went inside the light blue painted room with an entertainment system with flat screen TV two of the latest Zony and Mintendo consoles and a Blu-ray player with a library of games and movies and a three shelf drawer on the left side. In the back was a walk in closet with a small science lab with a small table with beakers and test tubes on it in the corner. The right side had his twin sized bed with dark blue covers and sheets with a nightstand with a lamp. At the foot of the bed was a window above a toy chest.

He closed the door behind him and tear open the packaging, laying the costume on the bed. Everything was there: the large diaper, Big Baby blue shirt, the rattle and the bottle. The border collie stripped down, tossing his shirt, shorts, and socks into a heap to the side. He slipped on the diaper and shirt and wielded the rattle and bottle. He went over to the closet and opened the door to see his reflection on the inside mirror. He giggled at the look and shook the rattle for fun.

He then looked at the bottle and got curious. Was it actually milk? He shook the bottle. Well, there was only one way to find out. He brought the nipple to his muzzle and sucked, drinking some of it. He wore a shocked expression at the surprising almond vanilla taste and how it was still fresh. He continued to drink until it was all gone, letting out a burp afterward. He looked at the empty bottle and just thought he'll refill it later.

"*Yawwwn....Ooh." he started to get a bit sleepy and woozy.

He went over to the bed at sat down, letting out another long yawn. His eyelids felt very heavy and decided to lie down while still gripping the rattle. Soon he was off to sleep.

What happens next?
13132211223333111.title: 'Baby' Brother

131322112233331111.content:
As Roni lied there, a strange sensation overcame him that made him toss and turn for a while. But that's when the changes happened.

His feet cracked and popped as they grew a couple of shoe sizes, but looking rather petite with dainty toes. His legs followed suit, stretching and growing into mature shapely womanly ones with thick thighs.

His pelvis region cracked as his hips began to widen and his waist thinned and trimmed down. His butt gained a a couple layers of fat as it grew bigger with a longer tail. He groaned as his penis and furred sac slowly receded into his body, developing a womanhood with a moist pussy that leaked in its place. The diaper stretched and strained but still intact, looking like a tight pair of panties.

His chest stretched and widened as it matured, straining the shirt. He moaned as two dark nipples became erect and fatter as two mounds slowly grew from A cups to EE cups in matter of seconds. Unlike the diaper, the shirt unfortunately ripped apart, spilling the big jugs. Like his feet and legs, his arms extended into slender fashion with hands that have thin fingers with manicured claw nails.

His head grew to match his new body with a more feminine face as his muzzle elongated and narrowed. From his scalp wavy long black hair flowed down til it reached mid-back.

The young male border collie pup was now a full grown adult female.

Did the transformation stop there?
131322112233331111.title: 'Baby' to Babe

1313221122333311111.content: Did reality and his surroundings change as well?
1313221122333311111.title: Yes

1313221122333311112.content: What other change took place?
1313221122333311112.title: No

13132211223333111123.content: What other change took place?
13132211223333111123.title: Macro/Micro?

13132213.content: Haunted House Havoc - While Trick or Treating, Roni and some friends explore an abandoned and supposedly haunted house only to meet up with a scary sex changing surprise.
13132213.title: Haunted House Havoc?

131322132.content: Werewoman Curse - When Tyrone finds a strange crescent moon pendant, he transforms into an adult female at the stroke of midnight where sexy shenanigans ensue.
131322132.title: Werewoman Curse?

1313221322.content: No More Than One (or Else) - While Trick or Treating, Roni and friends find a house with a large tub of candy yet no one attending it with a sign saying "Warning: Only One Candy Per Person". They ignore the sign and grabbed a handful, only to find themselves cursed and changing into something unexpected.
1313221322.title: No More Than One (or Else)?

13132213222.content: Spooky Maze Mystery - Roni goes to a spooky maze on Halloween night, but there is more to this maze than meets the eye.
13132213222.title: Spooky Maze Mystery?

1313222.content: Birthday Wish Warp - It's Roni's birthday and before he blows out the candles of his birthday cake, he makes a wish about being older/bigger. It gets granted but in an odd way.
1313222.title: Birthday Wish Warp?

13132222.content: Ailment Anomaly - Roni stays home from school due to a strange sickness. The symptoms are common at first from a hot fever, coughing fits, etc. that is until his body starts to change.
13132222.title: Ailment Anomaly?

131322221.content:
In a light blue room with a three tier drawer and an entertainment system with a flat screen TV, Zwitch console, DVD/BluRay player, and a library of games and movies in its shelves. The back of the room had a small book shelf of old textbooks and comics, a mini table with a science lab kit, and a walk in closet. Finally to the right of the room lied a nightstand with a lamp and a twin sized bed with a sick black and white floppy eared border collie under the navy blue covers, wearing only white underwear as he ran a fever of 101.5F while sniffling and coughing.

His elder brother Cam, who had mix of brown and splotches of purple in his fur, wore a button down collared white shirt and a pair of khakis and dress shoes. The middle brother, Jesse, wore athletic gear such as a jersey and shorts and sneakers. Both were about to leave for work and school, leaving the youngest all alone at home.

"I'll call the school to say that you're sick. Just get some rest okay, squirt?"

"O-okay..." Roni groaned weakly.

"Alright. See you later."

His brothers soon left the room and departed as the car sped off. He wanted to rest but despite being weak, he just couldn't due to his symptoms mainly. So tried to do other things to pass the time.

What did he do?
131322221.title: Ailment Anomaly

131322222.content: Girly Room Glitch - Roni wakes up one day to discover that his room has been converted into a girl's room with all his stuff gone and replaced with girly things. He thinks it is a prank done by his older brothers and tries to confront them only for them to be missing, leaving him home alone without any notice. Then, strange things start to happen as his surroundings in the house change, including himself.
131322222.title: Girly Room Glitch?

1313222222.content: Blockbusted - Similar to Game Makeover. Roni rents a DVD and is transported into the film he is watching, becoming a female lead in the process.
1313222222.title: Blockbusted?

13132222222.content: Alt Reality: Nudist Nonsense - Roni wakes up in a different reality to find himself naked in bed but also that clothes suddenly don't exist anymore, leaving everyone as a nudist. Could this day get any weirder for him? In more ways than one of course.
13132222222.title: Alt Reality: Nudist Nonsense?

131322222222.content: Sleepover Makeover - Roni hosts a sleepover party at his house with a couple of his friends yet under strange circumstances their bodies change overnight, Roni being the one who changes the most.
131322222222.title: Sleepover Makeover?

1313222222222.content: Roni in Wonderland - After playing in the backyard, Roni falls asleep underneath a tree where he is shrunk into a curious adventure of a lifetime.
1313222222222.title: Roni in Wonderland?

13132222222222.content: Cumming of Age - One day Roni wakes up with raging boner that couldn't stay down and keeps leaking. Whenever he blows his load, he finds himself slowly aging and growing into adulthood, but somehow at the same time losing his manhood in the process.
13132222222222.title: Cumming of Age?

131322222222222.content: Abduction - One night, Roni is awoken from his sleep to see a bright light outside his window. Upon inspecting, he gets abducted by aliens/unknown entities and forced to partake in strange experiments.
131322222222222.title: Abduction?

1313222222222221.content:
A young black and white border collie tossed and turned in his twin sized bed underneath blue covers. His floppy ears keep picking up some kind of humming sound that was just outside his window at the foot of his bed, next to the study desk.

"Mmm...Huh?" Roni mumbled as he slowly stirred awake by the commotion outside. He hopped out of bed and went over to the window. His eyes widen when just outside was a bright conical white light illuminating the front yard. He opened the window to get a better look as well as looked up to see bright blinking multicolored lights underneath some kind of large hovering craft. Soon the white light grew intense as it brighter, engulfing him completely to the point he blacked out.

When Roni groggily woke up, he found himself in someplace different.

Where is he?
1313222222222221.title: Outta This World

13132222222222211.content:
When Roni came to, he found himself in a fully white room with bright lights on the plain white ceiling.

He looked down to see that he was on large bed with white bedding, but also that he was naked when his sheath was in full view. Instinctively, he covered up with his hands.

"W-where am I?" he said as if trying to get an answer from anywhere.

Looking around, there was a nightstand to the right of him with glass of some kind of pink fluid. Across from the bed to the other side of the room had an open door to a bathroom by the sight of the sink, toilet, and shower within and next to that was a white three tier drawer. To his right there was a silver arching frame with a white sliding door. There was some kind of control panel with some buttons next to that.

He jumped off the bed and went over to the panel, pressing various buttons in random sequences. But nothing happened. He was stuck there, saddened about his situation. He looked back at the other things in the room, curious and wondering what they might do.

What happens next?
13132222222222211.title: In a white room

choices: Eat some of the pink candy
131322222222222112.content:
He walked over to the bathroom to see what he could find.

A regular toilet with toiler paper holder lied in the back with a towel rack above it. To the left was a sink with a steel faucet and what looked like a packet of unlabeled pink life savors candy and some kind of leather collar. To the right was the shower with a white curtain that was open and a bottle of unlabeled pink shampoo/body wash and a unlabeled purple bubble bath bottle on the edge of the tub.

What does he do next?
131322222222222112.title: He checks the bathroom

131322222222222113.content:
Still feeling naked and the need to cover up, he looked towards the drawer which could provide some covering for him.

He went over there and opened the top drawer to find it empty. Then, the second drawer, empty again to his annoyance. And then the third which had something in it.

What was in it?
131322222222222113.title: He checks the drawer

choices: Strapped onto some kind of table
13132222222222213.title: Table/Tank?

1313222222222222.content: Temporary Tat Trouble - One day while eating his cereal, he digs into the box to grab the free toy inside, being a sheet of temporary tattoos. Only thing about these that when applied on the fur they can actually indicate one's name and age. But things get strange when the age number increases, he increasingly becomes feminine as well.
1313222222222222.title: Temporary Tat Trouble?

13132222222222222.content: Ice Creamed - It's summertime and a new ice cream truck is making the rounds in Tyrone's neighborhood. However, the frozen treats served here does a lot more than help cool off.
13132222222222222.title: Ice Creamed?

131322222222222222.content: Bubble Bath Babe - Roni's eldest brother, Cam, bought him some new bubble bath liquid that has interesting effects.
131322222222222222.title: Bubble Bath Babe?

1313222222222222222.content: A Brief Change - Roni gets a new pack of briefs/underwear, only to experience some changes upon wearing them.
1313222222222222222.title: A Brief Change?

13132222222222222222.content: Cuckoo Clock Chaos - When his older brother brought home a strange antique cuckoo clock, Roni decides to mess with it for a little bit, not knowing what kind of life altering consequences that could happen.
13132222222222222222.title: Cuckoo Clock Chaos?

131322222222222222222.content: Morph-Opoly - Roni with a group plays a strange board game that affect the players as they play/
131322222222222222222.title: Morph-Opoly?

choices: His two older brothers Jesse and Cam
1313222222222222222221.content: Who does Roni play with?
1313222222222222222221.title: Yes

13132222222222222222211.content:
"Hey Jesse! Roni! Come downstairs!" called the eldest of the Collins brothers, Cam with splotches of purple and brown with black and white fur, wearing a light green button down shirt and black slacks who was in the den across the kitchen, standing next to a coffee table in between a black leather couch and a wide screen TV on a stand.

On the second floor, a mostly white furred with black splotch teen border collie wearing a white jersey with matching athletic shorts emerged from a room that had a basketball backboard and net on it. Coming out of a door with a bubbling beaker poster at the end of the hall was a ten year old border collie boy wearing a white shirt with red sleeves and blue shorts.

They went downstairs to the den where Cam was next to the coffee table with a brown game board on top with red and blue spaces, creating paths that cross and twist and turned that led to the center which was some black half circle or dome as its end point. At the start space had pawns of various colors, a pair of red dice, and there were two piles of red and blue cards correlating with the spaces.

"What game is this?" asked the middle brother.

"Morph-Opoly. Got it at an antique shop today and thought we could have some kind of game night for the three of us."

"Eh, dunno about this."

"Sounds fun! I get the blue piece." Roni said being interested to play as he sat on the floor.

"C'mon Jess. Just try it for once. And if you don't like it, you don't have to play it again."

"Alright, I guess." Jesse reluctant.

"Okay, now who would like to go first?" Cam said.
13132222222222222222211.title: Brotherly Bonding Board Game

13132222222222222222213.content: Who does Roni play with?
13132222222222222222213.title: More Friends Option

1313222222222222222222.content: Grow Up Hiccups - Roni gets a severely strange case of the hiccups with startling effects.
1313222222222222222222.title: Grow Up Hiccups?

13132222222222222222222.content: Chicken Pox Puberty - Similar to Ailment Anomaly but with Roni having an odd case of the chicken pox that does more than make his body itch.
13132222222222222222222.title: Chicken Pox Puberty?

132.content:
Scenarios:

Substitute: Roni goes into a class early to find no teacher or other students there. Soon after, he finds himself changing into a substitute teacher for some reason.

Bullies: Tyrone's being bullied by some older kids. Suddenly, he's growing up and changing. Does he get back at them? Flirt with them? Maybe even become more like them?

Lunchtime: The cafeteria food tastes odd today. Suddenly, Roni (and possibly his other classmates) are feeling strange.

Field Trip: Tyrone's class goes on a field trip, where he briefly gets separated from the group.
132.title: At school

choices: Tyrone become a teenage bad girl and wants to hang out with Mark's gang.
Tyrone transforms into an older lioness, and Mark starts calling her big sis.
Tyrone becomes an adult woman, a teacher that Mark begins apologizing to.
Tyrone becomes a flirty teen girl, crushing hard on Mark.
1322.content:
"Hey Roni!" the gruff voice called out, making the young collie jump anxiously, knowing what was about to happen. He tried to scurry away, only to be grabbed and pinned to the lockers by a larger boy.

Mark Moors was an older boy, a 13 year old lion with a bulky build that, unfortunately for Roni, had been held back a few years, keeping him in the same grade as kids like Roni. By his side were his friends, Butch the fox and Violet the hyena, both 11 years old and in the same grade as Mark. Tyrone struggled against Mark, hating that he had somehow become the main target of their bullying lately.

"You know, somethin' about your face makes me real mad, Roni. Real, real mad. You're a brainy little wuss that's good for nothin', you know that?" He pulled back his fist and thrust it forward, stopping just before striking the face to make Roni flinch. "Ha! Knew you were more chicken than dog! Why don'tcha grow up and stop bein' such a little wimp?"

With all his heart, Tyrone wished that were true. Suddenly, he felt a strange warmth in his chest. Then came a stretching feeling through his entire body. Mark backed off in surprise as, before his eyes, Tyrone began to change.
1322.title: Roni and the Bullies

1324.content: Where does the field trip take place?
1324.title: Field Trip

1325.content:
Locker Surprise - Roni discovers an old locker in the halls that holds a strange mystery inside.

Hitting the Showers - After P.E. class, Tyrone takes a shower only to find himself aging and changing for some reason.

13253.content:
Dainty Detention - Roni gets into an incident as well as into trouble, sent to detention, only to discover that there is more to his punishment than expected.

Lab Experiment Accident - During science class, Roni and the students are working in the science lab with test tubes and all. Of course, things don't go as planned.
13253.title: Other

132533.content:
Remade at Recess - It's recess time and there are many opportunities to transform Roni, from the blacktop to the playground.

Sex Ed Lesson - It's Roni's first day for sex education in class. However, the new teacher believes in a 'hands on' approach about teaching maturity and reproduction and has the means to age and even change the gender of some student 'volunteers'.
132533.title: Remade at Recess/Sex Ed Lesson?

133.content:
Choose a scenario:

Strange Shower Shenanigans - While at the beach with his two older brothers, Roni goes to the shower stalls to wash up before going into the water. However, in one of the stalls, he discovers something strange inside that eventually change his body.

Discovery Digs - With a toy bucket and shovel, Tyrone wants to dig deep in the sand and create a large hole to play in. However, his shovel struck something while digging and digs up something that affects his body.
133.title: At the beach

1331.content:
It was a clear and cloudless sunny day at an anthro beach where the surf calmly ebbed and flowed along the over two mile long shoreline. The sands had a sea of umbrellas with towels and blankets underneath and a volleyball court or two with five lifeguard posts evenly spaced and overlooking the entire area. Behind that were a bathroom/shower building and some food vendors and vending machines.

A trio of border collie brothers settled on a spot that was in between the waters and the shoreline's edge. Cam, the eldest brother who has some blotches of purple and brown along with black and white fur, wore purple swim trunks and pitched up an umbrella. Jesse, the middle athletic teen brother with mostly white fur with spots of black on his right ear and left eye, wore white swim shorts while holding a boogie board, heading towards the water. Tyrone or Roni, the youngest slightly tubby brother who had black fur mainly but had white on his forelimbs, torso, left ear tip and tail tip, wore light blue swim trunks and had a yellow inner tube around his waist.

Roni was about to follow Jesse into the water before the older brother stopped him.

"Whoa there squirt. You better take a shower first and wash up. Don't want to get your fur too tangled with salt water."

"Aww...do I have to?" Roni pouted.

His oldest brother gave him a stern look that caused a floppy ear and tail to twitch.

"Oh alright..." he said begrudgingly as he took off the inner tube and began to trek towards the restroom.

He went inside male restroom and was greeted with brown sandy tiles, white painted walls, and low hanging ceiling lights. Along the right wall there were a couple of urinals and toilets and four shower stalls with milky white shower curtains. Opposite wall had the three steel sinks with mirrors above them and an hand dryer at the end. It seemed like he was the only one there.

He headed over to the second stall, opened the curtain and stepped inside, closing it behind him. However, he noticed that something unusual was in the stall.

What did he find?
1331.title: Strange Shower Shenanigans

133122.content: What color was the bikini?
133122.title: Two piece

1332.content:
It was a clear and cloudless sunny day at an anthro beach where the surf calmly ebbed and flowed along the over two mile long shoreline. The sands had a sea of umbrellas with towels and blankets underneath and a volleyball court or two with five lifeguard posts evenly spaced and overlooking the entire area. Behind that were a bathroom/shower building and some food vendors and vending machines.

A trio of border collie brothers settled on a spot that was in between the waters and the shoreline's edge. Cam, the eldest brother who has some blotches of purple and brown along with black and white fur, wore purple swim trunks and pitched up an umbrella. Jesse, the middle athletic teen brother with mostly white fur with spots of black on his right ear and left eye, wore white swim shorts while holding a boogie board, heading towards the water. Tyrone or Roni, the youngest slightly tubby brother who had black fur mainly but had white on his forelimbs, torso, left ear tip and tail tip, wore light blue swim trunks.

The border collie pup was digging in the sand with yellow shovel and red pail in hand, pretending to be a pirate searching for hidden treasure. He dug a good few feet into the hole he made until his plastic shovel struck some kind of object in the sand.

What did he find?
1332.title: Discovery Digs

133231.content: What color is the liquid?
133231.title: Vial of liquid

choices: He goes into the water to swim
1332311.content:
His shovel hit something glass in the dirt as it glinted in the sunlight.

"Huh?" Roni said puzzled as he wiped away more sand off it.

It was a small delicate glass vial filled a strange clear red liquid. He shook the vial curiously, wondering what could it be. Again curiosity got the better of him as he popped open the top, sniffing the contents. It surprisingly smelled like cherries so it probably wouldn't hurt to taste it, he thought. Then, he gulped down the contents, licking his lips of the delicious drink. He then felt something like butterflies in his stomach as it growled slightly and got a small case of the tingles before subsiding.

'Now that was weird." he thought to himself as he felt his swimsuit be a bit snug yet loose around his waist.

What happens next?
1332311.title: Red

1332331.content: What was the door made out of?
1332331.title: A hatch door

13323312.content:
While digging a bit further, his shovel hit something hard and solid with a resounding clang.

"Huh?" he puzzled.

After removing much of the sand, he discovered some kind of metal hatch with a latch. What is this suppose to be? Curious got the better of him as he unhook the latch. It took great effort for the pup to open up the hatch but somehow managed. Looking down, there was ladder on one side and a string of lights on the opposite side guiding down.

Wondering what is down there, he began the climb down which was roughly twenty feet. Once he got to the bottom he was amaze about what he found.

What did he find?
13323312.title: Metal

1333.content: Bizarre Beach Cave - While at the beach, Roni checks out a beach cave embedded in a cliff side and discovers some strange sex changing thing inside.
1333.title: Bizarre Beach Cave?

TG Tourist Trap - There are many roadside attractions that can throw a road trip off schedule and Roni had to be attracted to the one the changes gender.

Henry Huskins - A 7 year old white and gray brave Siberian Husky pup. Height: 3.8 ft

15.title: More Characters

info.brief_description: Anthro boys turn into grown anthro women!
info.description:
Anthro boys from ages 1-10 turn into grown female anthro women and then some!

Some rules to establish

1. Age Progression and TG should be the main focus but other kinds of TF is allowed. No scat or watersports.
2. No killing or death of chars.
3. Boys ages 10 and under are only allowed to change and the main focus. Other chars can join in on the TF fun too.
4. Sex is allowed (only after the boys turn into women, no underage sex. Cub nudity/masturbation is accepted though). No gays/lesbians. No herms either.
5. Also, it's an Anthro Only world so no human's whatsoever. Just to be more clear.
6. Have fun.
